message.content:
I need to identify the addition in accounts payable, which represents the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received on credit during the period.

Looking at the financial statement:

1. From the balance sheet, I can see that Accounts Payable increased from an Initial_amount of 0.00 (2023-12-31) to an End_amount of 302000.00 (2024-02-05).

2. From the cash flow statement, I can see the line item "Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable" with an amount of 302000.00.

The increase in Accounts Payable of 302000.00 represents the specific value of the addition in the amount owed by the entity for goods or services received or purchased on credit during the period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '302000.00'} }
```
